class.name: DojoC
class.brief_description: A static class for managing Dojo configuration settings.
class.description: This class provides static methods to initialize and manage configuration settings for the Dojo SDK. It allows resetting the configuration and setting individual values.

method.name: init_config
method.description: Initializes or resets the configuration. If [code]reset[/code] is [code]true[/code], it will reset the configuration to its default values.

method.name: init_setting
method.description: Sets a specific configuration setting. [code]setting[/code] is the name of the setting, [code]value[/code] is the new value, and [code]force[/code] determines whether to overwrite an existing value.

members.member: A boolean flag to enable or disable the Dojo SDK functionality.
